short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Groups of Extensions to quickly enable/disabled unused items!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to group your extensions and quickly enable/disable them by group!

Create a group for each type of extension you use, then simply enable or disable all extensions in that group!
